personName.description:
Specify contact name. Maximum length is 70.
Note: Either the companyName or personName is mandatory.
Example: John Taylor

emailAddress.description:
Specify contact email address. Maximum length is 80.
Example: sample@company.com

phoneExtension.description:
Specify contact phone extension. Maximum length is 6.
Example: 1234

phoneNumber.description:
Specify contact phone number.
Minimum length is 10 and supports Maximum as 15 for certain countries using longer phone numbers.
Note: Recommended Maximum length is 15 and there's no specific validation will be done for the phone number.
Example: 918xxxxx890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name. Maximum length is 35.
Note: Either the companyName or personName is mandatory.

description: Indicate the contact details for this shipment.
